name: Fish Mania 74 World
description:
It is a fun and challenging fishing game, with animated and creative scenarios containing unique details, colors and animated shapes to improve the game experience.
Do your work in adventure mode and earn XP and Gold to unlock new clothes and maps, find hidden chests and use items from your backpack to complete the levels!
If you want to have fun you have come to the right place, this is an exciting adventure full of rewards and challenges, with many different fish that you will find on the maps to explore, you can catch them using nets and rockets to help you!
How to play:
1 The game is easy to learn and very intuitive
2 Use items from the backpack to help you
3 When you have Gold go to the store and buy everything you need
4 Earn XP and level up to unlock new clothes, skins and more!
5 Avoid big fish as they will stop your hook      Incredible
Content:
1 Various maps for fun
2 + 100 Pieces of clothing to match
3 4 Bears for fun
4 Hidden chests with lots of coins
5 Daily rewards
6 Free way to spend time with the little ones
7 Unlock items and earn Gold to use in the store
8 Challenging time missions
Download for free and have fun with this work of art!
Enter our channel and learn how to create amazing games like this with several tutorials and tips:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0650aI0QXjwPUSIsvGJIGg
Bugs!? Report:  reportdavidgames@gmail.com
